description:
What is it: Configures logging to capture Intune events, which can then be analyzed using Log Analytics Workspaces. 
 Simeon Notes: Provides you with the data needed to monitor Intune events within your tenant. Setup alerts when a device is marked as non-compliant or be notified when a new device is enrolled. Simeon’s baseline captures device audit logs, compliance, and operational logs. Logs can be viewed in the Analytics Workspace named ‘tenant Name-M365logging’ and are stored in the Azure Storage Account named tenantNameM365Logging.
 Learn More: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/device-management-in-microsoft/microsoft-intune-and-azure-log-analytics/ba-p/463145
